snippet: A groundbreaking deal between Clear Channel Communications and the Big Machine record label raised the possibility of a solution over compensation for broadcasting music.
abstract: Groundbreaking deal between Clear Channel Communications and Big Machine record label raises the possibility of a solution over compensation for broadcasting music; agreement will for the first time allow a record company to collect a royalty when its songs are played on the radio.
